login_subtitle: Log in or create your account to start shortening, sharing, and tracking your links.
or_magic_link: Or sign in with a magic link
user_not_register: No user found registered with this email.
user_not_registered_by_credentials: We found that this email is linked to an account created using Google login. You can sign in with your Google account and, if you wish, set a password afterward. Alternatively, you can reset your password by clicking “Forgot my password”.
invalid_password: The password entered is invalid for this email.
error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
create_account_login: Don't have an account yet? Create one
sign_in_login: Already have an account? Log in
passwords_do_not_match: The passwords you entered don’t match.
user_already_registered: A user is already registered with the provided email.
create_account_success: Account successfully created! Click the button below to sign in with your credentials.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in to continue.
empty_dashboard_text_1: It looks like you haven't created any links yet.
empty_dashboard_text_2: Click the button below to start shortening URLs with ease!
loading_text: We're getting everything ready for you!
label_url_min_3_caracteres: The label must be at least 3 characters long
label_url_rule: The label must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, single hyphens, and cannot start or end with a hyphen.
label_url_required: Label is required if automatic generation is disabled
create_shortener_link_subtitle: Fill in the fields below to generate a custom URL.
random_label_description_1: Since the random option is disabled, manually define the final part of the URL using hyphens instead of spaces.
random_label_description_3: The base URL will always be
generate_random_label_helper: The end of the link will be generated automatically.
http_not_valid_protocol: The 'http' protocol is not allowed. Please use URLs with 'https' or just send the URL without a protocol and we’ll handle it for you.
required_link_label: It is mandatory to provide the text that will be used at the end of the link.
label_already_register: This link ending is already in use. Please choose another.
success_create_shortener: Your shortened link was created successfully!
dashboard_intro: Here are your shortened links. You can easily copy, edit or remove any of them.
success_edit_shortener: Your shortened link was edited successfully!
edit_shortener_link_subtitle: Fill in the fields below to edit your custom URL.
not_allowed_edit_label: The label (URL identifier) cannot be edited after creation. To change it, delete the link and create a new one with the desired label.
are_you_sure_delete_link: Are you sure you want to delete this link?
error_intro: Oops, something went wrong. See below for some possible causes:
error_link_incorrect: The link is incorrect or incomplete.
error_link_removed: It may have been removed or expired.
error_link_confirm: If someone sent it to you, please confirm the link is correct.
error_server_unstable: The server may be experiencing instability. Please try again soon.
expired_code: The code has expired. Click 'Resend' to generate a new one.
invalid_code: The code you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.
please_fill_the_code_sended_to_email: Please enter the code we sent to your email below
resend_code_success_text: Code resent successfully! If needed, you can request a new one in
max_limit_5_shorteners: You can shorten up to 5 links. We're working on a premium version where this limit will be removed. For now, you can delete existing links to add new ones.
error_send_email_with_link_to_reset_pass: An error occurred while sending the password reset link. Please try again later.
reset_password_subtitle: Enter your email address below to receive a password reset link.
send_reset_password_link_to: We sent a password reset link to: {{email}}
already_register_or_want_register: Already have an account or want to sign up?
fill_with_your_new_password: Fill in the fields below with your new password
code_not_found: The password reset link is incorrect, please check if you are using the correct link.
password_link_expired: The password reset link has expired. Please request a new one to continue.
user_not_found_or_register: No account was found for the email associated with this link. If you don't have an account yet, please register.
new_password_is_the_same_old_password: The new password cannot be the same as the current password. Please choose a different password.
reset_password_with_success_text_1: Your password has been reset successfully! You will be redirected to the authentication page in
click_button_go_direct: If you prefer, click the button below to go directly.
required_alphabetical_caracter: The password must contain at least one letter
required_number_caracter: The password must contain at least one number
user_delete_account_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account_deleted_success: Your account has been successfully deleted
user_delete_account_text: By deleting your account, this action will be irreversible. All your shortened links and profile data will be permanently erased. To use the platform again, you will need to create a new account from scratch.
password_changed_success: All set! Your password has been updated. Please log in again to continue using the platform.
fill_the_fields_to_change_password: Fill in the fields below to change your password
file_too_large: File too large! Please upload an image up to 2MB.
saved: All changes have been successfully saved!
to_change_email_talk_suport_text: To change your email, please contact support via email
you_sure_remove_your_avatar: Are you sure you want to remove your current avatar?
privacy_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how your information is collected, used, and protected when using the SnipplyURL platform.
privacy_section_1_text: We may collect information such as name, email, login provider (e.g., Google), and data related to shortened links, such as the original URL, creation date, and number of clicks.
privacy_section_2_text: Collected information is used to provide and improve our services, personalize the user experience, send relevant communications (such as registration confirmation or password recovery), and ensure platform security.
privacy_section_3_text: We do not share your personal information with third parties unless required by law or with your explicit consent.
privacy_section_4_text: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve navigation, authenticate sessions, and collect anonymous usage statistics.
privacy_section_5_text: Data is securely stored and we use technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
privacy_section_6_text: You may request the deletion of your account and data at any time through the platform settings or by contacting us.
privacy_section_7_text: We may update this Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page.
privacy_section_8_text: If you have questions or requests related to privacy, contact us at:
home_description: is a simple and free tool to turn long links into short, practical URLs.
page_not_found_description: It looks like the link is broken or the page you're looking for doesn't exist.
